title: How to Log in to Game Center

steps.title: Open your iPhone or iPad’s Settings .
steps.content: Open your iPhone or iPad’s Settings . You’ll usually find it on the home screen. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Game Center.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Game Center . It’s near the center of the list. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Slide the “Game Center” switch to .
steps.content: Slide the “Game Center” switch to . A confirmation message will appear. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . This signs you into Game Center using the Apple ID that’s currently logged into your phone or tablet. [5] X Research source If you want to sign in with a different Apple ID, tap Not (person’s name)? to enter a username and password.

steps.title: Click the menu.
steps.content: Click the menu. It’s at the top-left corner of the screen. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click Internet Accounts.
steps.content: Click Internet Accounts . It’s the round blue icon with a white “@” inside.

steps.title: Click +.
steps.content: Click + . It’s at the bottom-left corner of the left column.

steps.title: Scroll down and click Add Other Account….
steps.content: Scroll down and click Add Other Account… . It’s the final option under the list of account types.

steps.title: Click Game Center account.
steps.content: Click Game Center account . It’s the for overlapping circles of varying colors and sizes.

steps.title: Enter your Apple ID username and password and click Sign In.
steps.content: Enter your Apple ID username and password and click Sign In . Once the password is accepted, you’ll be logged into Game Center.
